website_summaries.verdict: Good looks and an easy fit for most tires make this tire cover a good pick for spares, whether attached to your vehicle or stored in your garage.
pros: Offers a universal size that fits most tires
Looks attractive when in place on an onboard spare
Elastic and clips can be adjusted to fit most types of tires
Available in two sizes and in black or white
cons: Seams tend to come loose over time, especially with extensive exposure to harsh weather
May not fit very thick tires

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to cover a spare tire on a trailer that will spend most of its life uncovered. Worked well out of the box. Fit the 15" spare well and there is a hook on the back to help keep it tight. Won't flap around in the wind and has a nice clean look to it. Attached is a picture of the sizing chart from the box. I struggled to figure out the right size due to conflicting information. Hopefully this helps someone.
customer_reviews.author: congaboy77

customer_reviews.title: Fit fine for me but...
customer_reviews.text: This large cover fits fine for me on my van, but my tire size is only 30.5 inches in diameter. It was quite a struggle to put this on my tire, not sure how this could fit up to a 33" tire. Also the color is white, BRITE white, does not really match my van which has a very common white color. But for the price this is definitely a 5 star item. Edit: 9/2018 After a year and a half use the cover is turning very yellow. I took off one star for this.
customer_reviews.author: zumaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: My tire is within the specified size listed and the ... *destroyed in less than 8 months*
customer_reviews.text: My tire is within the specified size listed and the cover will not cover my tire entirely. The cover cracked and broke in the process of fitting over the spare. It's still doing its job for the moment but the quality and size are a big let down. Update: Roughly 8 months and the thing just gave up the ghost and has multiple splits. All regular use. Will update if the supplier reaches out for solution.
customer_reviews.author: kevink121

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super simple to put on, fit my tire perfect, vinyl stuck perfect! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Small price, fantastic quality!
customer_reviews.text: My spare tire cover was in dire need of replacement but I wasn't willing to spend $100+ on one with a design, just to have it fade in the sun. I decided to take a chance on this one and figured if it needed to be replaced in a few months, it'd still be cheaper in the long run. However, I must say I'm incredibly impressed with the thickness and durability of this tire cover. It fit my tire perfectly (Wrangler DuraTrac 255/70/R18) and has help up extremely well over the last month. It's seen a ton of sun and car washes and still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: MamaC3511

customer_reviews.title: A great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for the spare on my 1992 Chevrolet Silverado. The old tire was basically unusable after being exposed to the elements for years. After purchasing a new tire, I thought I'd add a cover to help protect it. This cover fit my tire perfectly. I cut a hole in it so the "hangar" could go through to lift the tire back into it's home. Very happy with this product for the price. Time will tell how well it holds up, but any cover is better than none!
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a vinyl sticker from Etsy and easily created a custom look
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a solid product. Fit our 27” RV spare tire. Appreciate the thick matierial and the cinch cord around the back to make it a tight fit. I took off one star because of the excessive creases, but I will add it back if they come out. I ordered a vinyl sticker from Etsy (a seller called Southerly Charm) and easily created a custom look for a fraction of the price. FYI I ordered a 10” sticker for a 27” wheel and would get a larger sticker next time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Z.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tire cover for a 2004 Toyota Rav4. It fits very well with no loose material. It was easy to install, just take your time and get it right. I especially like the bungee cord with hooks to help keep it tight on the tire. I live in Arizona so will have to see how long it lasts in the sun but it is doing its job of protecting the spare tire from sun damage, so it's a win!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Fits as described with proper size selected - looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Received the cover when promised and it looks great as cover for the rear mounted spare tire on a 1994 Chevy full size custom Starcraft conversion van. The cover replaces the original custom fiberglass tire cover, which is no longer available, that was damaged in a rear end collision a few years ago. I had another similar replacement cover but it only lasted about two years before becoming brittle and tearing as a result of exposure to the Arizona sun and heat. I have higher expectations for this replacement cover.
customer_reviews.author: rhb

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes the cheapest surprises you!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect this product to be a 5 star, because it's so cheap. It proved me wrong. It fit our tire exactly, was easy to put on and stays exactly where we put it. I'll buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: The Organic Millennial

customer_reviews.title: Great item for your spare. Looks nice and it is well made.
customer_reviews.text: I live in Arizona so did not expect it to last forever. I did get over a year out of it and now the top is starting to crack up. Will get another soon. It fits my tire well and it has an elastic band inside with clips at each end to snug it up. Covers around the back side of the tire as well. It cleans up the trailers look having it on. I like the gray, It does not attract as much heat.
customer_reviews.author: J. V.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for 2015 Jeep Wrangler Unlimited
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2015 Jeep Wrangler Unlimited with P255/75R17 tires. They are a little over 32". The cover fits very snug. In fact it looks like it was made for my tire. I don't know if a 33" would fit. It was a bit of a struggle to get it on my spare, not sure if a tire 1" larger would work or not. Anyway I am very happy with the product. I have only had it a couple of weeks so I'll have to see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: VirtualDrummer

customer_reviews.title: Good Replacement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the Hardshell cover on a 2007 Toyota Rav4 -- the OEM Cover is near impossible to remove in Perfect conditions without cracking the hardshell plastic cover, Something I can't imagine being successful at on the side of 95 in the dead of winter as my luck would have it, Besides the OEM cover had seen better days. This cover is easy on and easy off. So far I have zero complaints after about 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: TJB63

customer_reviews.title: Material not as heavy/not as snug as hoped.
customer_reviews.text: 8/23/2020: This cover is OK, but the material is more like a basic cover for a gas grill than the heavy, leathery feel of the previous wheel cover I had. i ordered the correct size for my wheel, but I can’t seem to get it tight enough around the spare to get the wrinkles out. Maybe the sun and time will make it more form-fitting. . .
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good fit  for 205/ 70r15
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and works great. No issues with it coming loose on the freeway or anywhere else. Dust washes off clean with just water. I'm using this on a first generation Honda CRV with 205/70 r15 tires. I'm guessing it would fit up to a 215 70/15 since there is a little extra space if you need it...I didn't and the cord included cinched it up tight no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Nice tire cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice tire cover. I added vinyl lettering on it for my travel trailer and I’m pretty happy with it. It is a bit thin for a tire cover so we’ll see how it lasts. I do intend to put a full camper cover on the RV when in storage so the tire will be covered as well. It has a split on the bottom with a bungee to cinch it tight.
customer_reviews.author: Christie276

customer_reviews.title: Little but mighty tire cover that doesn’t break your bank
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my trailers spare tire. It was easy to put on and the elastic worked well to hug itself to the tire but at the same time didn’t cause me great strain to put on. It rained like crazy the next few days and it kept my tire dry but the water collected in the middle of the cover. I’m going to have to put something inside to allow it to drain off. But even with the water sitting there, the cover still felt strong and made of good material.
customer_reviews.author: Grrlnexdoor

customer_reviews.title: Fit my needs
customer_reviews.text: This cover fit my 225/75R15 trailer spare. It seems pretty thin material but works well. There is an elastic cord in the back that has a hook and one ened and a loop in the other to keep it together. It was pretty snug going on and had to wiggle it to get it centered but fit nice and doesn't flap in the wind from being too loose.
customer_reviews.author: spuds4u

customer_reviews.title: Used to cover spare tire mounted on utility trailer
customer_reviews.text: My spare is the 205/75/15 size, and this cover fits with a little bit of "wiggle" room; which is perfectly fine by me. Means that I don't have to fight with it, to get it on. Not baggy, at the same time. With the extra room, the draw strings on the inside/bottom have more room to pull, so I can wrap it around the trailer support for extra tension. Quality is a faux-leather ext., with a soft interior. We will see how this holds up, but I assume the combination should withstand any weather, so long as it's not continuously 120°+.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Walker

customer_reviews.title: It's a good little cover (size sm 28-29")
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 225/65-17 2011 Rav4 spare just right. What made it easier to put on was I took the spare off and started the cover over the bottom half. with enough room to mount the spare back on I did and finished pulling the cover over the sides and top. Split with tie at the bottom. I have only had it on for a few weeks. We shall see how it holds up after a couple Summers. The cover is fairly thin which may ultimately cause it to prove less durable than a more expensive thicker one, but for the money I didn't have to spend I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but could look better.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cover the spare 205/70/15 tire on the back of a 2001 Honda CRV. It seems like a tight/secure fit, but doesn't have that clean, form-fitted look around the tire and instead has some wrinkle all around it. As long as it stays installed and keeps the weather off that spare tire I guess it's not that big of a deal and will work until I can find something better looking.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: I still rated 5 stars because the cover is a really nice quality pleather and if I could get one to ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my H3 tire, my tire is 32" diameter and 12" thick. I still rated 5 stars because the cover is a really nice quality pleather and if I could get one to fit my tire I would buy this brand again. It was $18, You cant beat that.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Classic Accessories 75347 Overdrive Universal Fit Spare Tire Cover, Black, Small-Fits well, good construciont
customer_reviews.text: Classic Accessories 75347 Overdrive Universal Fit Spare Tire Cover, Black, Small This is a well constructed vinyl tire cover for the rear, or where ever, of your vehicle. I had a logo stenciled on and put it on the tire. The fit is tight, as it should be, looks good and the hook connectors for the rubber tensioner is tight. I would recommend. I do not know the seller nor did I receive product or compensation for my independant review. 180205 1238
customer_reviews.author: Runion

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cover, get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this cover for awhile now and I haven’t done a review for it until now but it didn’t hold up super well. The pleather that it is, doesn’t take to rock chips too well. It got a hole in it literally a month after owning it and it looks horrible. I would recommend getting a higher quality l, maybe well known brand over a cheap cover like this one
customer_reviews.author: rachel tetreault

customer_reviews.title: Fits just fine
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Classic tire cover to replace one that had some how blown off my trailer spare during travel. I measured the diameter (28") and ordered the one that gave a range (26.75" - 29.75"). The fit was tight, but in a good way. What I really like is at the bottom of the cover are two elastic "bungee" type cords with heavy plastic hooks. Connect these hooks to each other and they protect the cover from blowing off in transit. The price was right and overall a good value. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: c980t

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy!. Really had problem trying to ensure I was buying the right size. This cover (75387) fir perfectly over my 225 65R !7 tires on wife's Rav 4. Quality good, fit perfect, price couldn't be beat. Looks great on car. Toyota wanted $350. plus to replace the plastic cover that came with the vehicle. Very pleased. On Rav 4 you have to remember to locate the fasteners on bottom right of door where there is some extra room to clip them together easily.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but with regards to the fit
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality but with regards to the fit, maybe I missed something, but I drive a medium sized SUV (Honda CRV) and I thought standard tire size is what I had. However, the tire cover is a little loose (too large) and not as fitted as I wanted it to be. It does still look much better than my previous tire cover so I decided to keep it. I suggest you measure your tires and not assume anything about size...
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought the small for my spare tire size 225/65r17 . It fit okay, but was a little tight. I gave it to my son for his donut spare . He keeps it in the back of his Dodge Journey. I ordered the large for the spare tire for my Caravan. Nice vinyl cover. I'm impressed !!
customer_reviews.author: Big Al

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit wide tires
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months, there is notable deterioration on the top of the cover where it is exposed to the sun. Also, the cover doesn't fit wide AT tires. I have 285 75 R16 tires (32.8 inch diameter, 11.22 inches wide), and the cover does not fit right on this wide of a tire, even though it's not that strange of a size in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: I got this mainly to keep the sun off of a trailer spare tire. It isn't very thick, but that's ok as long as the UV protection is there. Nice padding on the inside, and I like the hooks on the bungie cords so no tying it on. I don't think it will blow off at highway speed. How long the plastic hooks survive the sun and weather is yet to be determined, and even if somebody steals it it's only ten bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Hill

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for :-)
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I bought a tire cover was that I could now go through drive-through carwashes. Unfortunately, this tire cover is so loosely on the tire than immediately came off inside the car wash. I was able to retrieve it but it’s definitely not something I’ll be going through car washes with
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Like others stated this was a good fit with some ...
customer_reviews.text: Like others stated this was a good fit with some adjustment and the hooks are great - its still on there (didn't fly off or catch any wind) But, also like others said the white fuzz on the inside is kind of a mess upon removal. Overall its great for what I paid and it serves its purpose. (for a 2004 Toyota Rav4 spare tire)
customer_reviews.author: marshall jackson

customer_reviews.title: 2005 Honda CR-V cover
customer_reviews.text: The 26-29" fit my car perfectly. Someone stole my cover and my spare tire and the dealership wanted an obscene amount for a replacement. This isn't flimsy vinyl and will last quote a few years in this intense sounthen sun. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: PitaPumpkinEater

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit 93 Pathfinder
customer_reviews.text: The original spare tire cover that came with my Pathfinder 25 years ago finally gave out, the zipper ripped out. I found this with favorable reviews. I was curious but skeptical. It fit like a glove! It's also easier to get on or off. It is light weight and soft material, you have to be very careful not to punch a hole in it. But for ten bucks and a little care it should work out great.
customer_reviews.author: Steve and Amy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful to use as a hose reel UV protector!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a cover for my hose reel! (See photo) Thought the idea up while sitting in traffic behind an SUV with the spare tire on the rear.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Tight Fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to cover my spare tire on my new SUV. It fits tightly around the tire and was a bit difficult to get on but I feel like the tire is properly covered. Since this tire cover is all black, I feel that I can put a logo or decal on it. It's well made and I do not feel that it will rip. I've only had it a few weeks so I will be updating this review with time.
customer_reviews.author: London

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2011 MDX Adv with 255/50R19 tires. I traded out my donut spare for a full size when I purchased new tires (used the best of the old tires as the new spare). The MDX stores the spare tire underneath back cargo area exposed to the elements. Wanted to try this cover to help with the sand/dirt/muck that will build-up on a spare in this location. The cover fit very snugly and I could connect the plastic clips. Time will tell if the cover will hold up to the elements in this location. So far, it looks good, covers the tire nicely, and it looks so much better with the cover on.
customer_reviews.author: Mrgold35

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest longevity
customer_reviews.text: It's not terrible, but it's been about six months and it's cracking up pretty bad. Not too bad for the price, I guess. But, it's 2018, we're in the future now, and we should have the technology to cover a tire for more than six months at a time.
customer_reviews.author: boomshakaday

customer_reviews.title: Bargain price, decent item
customer_reviews.text: Finding a cover to fit larger tires is tough. I wasn't expecting much at this price range, but I'm pleased with what i got. The cover isn't very thick. But it went on nicely, has a decent retention system, and looks good. Would expect to have to replace it within a cpl years, but at this price, I'm ok with that! 1 star off for thinness of material
customer_reviews.author: ChristianOffroad

customer_reviews.title: best durability and quality out there
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. The last one I bought lasted me 7 years in the hot Texas sun. I had bought a cheaper version off Amazon, which only lasted one day- it flapped in the wind and tore. This one is thick, fits well onto the wheel and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mariska Visser

customer_reviews.title: Caution-only 30 days to return item
customer_reviews.text: This cover did not fit, and I am just over the 30 days allowance (news to me, might be in the fine print). Amazon does not seem to have a reasonable return policy anymore. I am a long time Amazon Prime customer, but this just does not work. There are many logistical reasons it may take longer than 30 days to return an item.
customer_reviews.author: Outbackgeorgia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality! No color fading after months!
customer_reviews.text: I definetly recommend purchasing this spare wheel cover. Ive had for many months now and my vehicle isnt garage kept, but the cover still looks brand new. Theres no cracking of the material or fading in the black color. Really a great deal at an very affordable price. Thanks for a well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but the fit is very snug
customer_reviews.text: The vinyl is heavy, no complaints about the stitching or the bungee cord, but I had a real struggle to get it on the spare on my RAV4 and still am not satisfied with the fit. It may be because of the way that the tire is mounted, but if I were to buy this again, I'd get the large size.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M. Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tire Cover
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace the one that came on our trailer, which had an obnoxious graphic plus the dealership name. This one is straight black and we had no issues with it fitting over our existing spare. Looks sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Avenue-7

customer_reviews.title: Nice Spare Tire Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and good value for the price. Was tight fit for our spare tire on our cargo trailer but that was fine with us. Unfortunately someone in Caldwell, Idaho also took a liking to it in the middle of the night when we were on our way back to BC. Oh well, I guess we'll just buy another and take it into our motel when were travelling.
customer_reviews.author: Critical Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money, ripped just placing it on the spare tire. I made sure I ordered the right size, waited until a hot day and left it out in the sun to be more pliable. Slowly fitted it over the top and adjusted as I worked to the bottom. At the very bottom the seem tore out.....
customer_reviews.author: brose73

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, mildews over time, but that's to be expected. Rain gets in and pools at the bottom of the tire. Probably again expected.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Field

customer_reviews.title: Why pay more?
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance and decided on this tire cover for my stock Jeep Wrangler spare tire. I could not be happier with the material and the fit. I highly recommend this cover and believe it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: terryfoster2u

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality tire cover
customer_reviews.text: I use these covers to protect my summer wheels during the winter. Unfortunately, they do not completely cover my 275-40-20 wheels. However, they do cover all of the wheel face and most of the tire. I'm surprised by the high quality of these covers considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ebben

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: This tire cover is awesome. It's a thick layered material that stands up to weather protecting your exposed spare tire. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: David62

customer_reviews.title: Good buy and fits okay
customer_reviews.text: I slipped this on a 205/75R 15 trailer tire and its a slight be loose, but should stay on okay. It has a fuzzy on the tire side of the cover. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: ItsAllAboutTime

customer_reviews.title: Even I Could Attach It
customer_reviews.text: First time to order a spare tire cover. Didn't want to spend a fortune, so I ordered this one. Price is right. I was able to attach it to the spare tire easily. Quality seems good. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: K Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my RZR spare!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my RZR side by side 27" spare tire and it fits perfectly! Quality seems good for the price. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Brent T.

customer_reviews.title: Fit my CRV 2001 nicely.
customer_reviews.text: My CRV 2001 original finally could rest in peace. The new one comes with reasonable price, fits nicely.
customer_reviews.author: J.N.L

customer_reviews.title: Good buy and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Fits wells and seems to be well made. Using it for my full spare tire that I will be keeping inside the trunk. Fits my 2005 Toyota Sienna full size tire. From what I can tell about the texture and looks of the material, it would probably last a year if used outside.
customer_reviews.author: J.D

customer_reviews.title: 7.50-16 trailer tire
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cover the spare on my trailer to protect it from the sun vs for looks. Initially it seemed cheap coming out of the box, just the feel of it, but for $18 and with the way things are going these days it seems everything is 'cheaper' for the money. The inside is nice and soft so it sure would not scratch polished rims if you had them. Was snug going on which is good, I didnt want a loose wrinkled fit. It fit the tire very well. On the fence as to how long I expect it to last, I would guess a few years. When it comes apart I will be back to report.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Simons

customer_reviews.title: It fit nice and snug and I installed it with less than ...
customer_reviews.text: This item fit well on my travel trailer spare. The size I ordered was based on the suggested measurement techniques for sizing and I added 1 inch extra (28 inches total). It fit nice and snug and I installed it with less than moderate effort. I was satisfied with the material and design. The positive experience with this product and subsequent (yet to be determined) material durability will have an influence on the future purchases of the same.
customer_reviews.author: RQ

customer_reviews.title: Easily Installed
customer_reviews.text: Installed easy on my 14" spare tire on my camper. It was so easy I thought I may have done something wrong. Stays in place with an attached elastic strap with hooks installed.
customer_reviews.author: P. Muntz

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Great simple black tire cover! Desperately needed one and this was perfect! Makes my little 2001 Honda CR-V look nicer, wish it had some design BUT it doesn’t matter, gives great coverage & gets the job done for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Melyzah

customer_reviews.title: Great product, 3 years and still in good condition
customer_reviews.text: i had to buy new cover as upgraded my wheels with bigger size, so applies to the spare wheel. stock cover does not work with it. I have this cover for almost 3 years, still intact and in good condition (despite cat scratches as they like sleeping on the spare wheel) temperature here reaches around 50C degrees for couple of months and 4-5 months around 40C. so it can withstand these conditions very well.
customer_reviews.author: Samer Massoud

customer_reviews.title: By far and away the best so far 👍
customer_reviews.text: I speak from experience, this is the 3rd tire cover I've had to buy in the last year. This is buy far and away, superior better quality than the last two. I've I could crank up the rating from 5 to 11 stars, I certainly would.
customer_reviews.author: Mick O

customer_reviews.title: Fits fine
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the small 26.75"-29.75" for 2002 Honda CR-V. Not as tight as original, but fits pretty well. I actually like this fit better so I'm not fighting to put on or remove.
customer_reviews.author: Jlloyd

customer_reviews.title: better than average tire cover
customer_reviews.text: fits a 205/75-15 trailer wheel just fine. I chose to untie the knot on the bungee clips and shorten the bungee to make it tighter and re tied it with a double night. fits nice and snug. The material appears to be above average quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Great product and works perfectly! Fit is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these for different vrhicles. Works perfectly and elastic holds tight to the tire. It’s been a year now and they are still holding up great to the wind and weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Dastrup

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product but....
customer_reviews.text: The quality and fit of this cover is excellent. However..... I suggest that users add a safety tie-down or bungie. At highway speed my 1st cover blew off our trailer. This, my 2nd, has a bungie added across the back.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly 06 Toyota RAV4
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my 06 Toyota RAV4. I chose this option over the OEM plastic because I have a bicycle spare tire rack and needed to remove the cover everytime I use it and this works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mekox

customer_reviews.title: Says will fit on a 35 inch tire. Well ...
customer_reviews.text: Says will fit on a 35 inch tire. Well kinda. Depends how wide. I have an extra 285-70-17 spare with 11/32 tread left and it barley covers the tread and down not come over on to the back sidewall. I'm using this on a inside my SUV spare as the under car spare carrier does not fit a 285/70/17. If you tried to fit it over a new 35 inch duratrac, this would be a no go.
customer_reviews.author: J-DUB

customer_reviews.title: :D
customer_reviews.text: A little loose but very durable and still looks brand new after a year of having
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Got to work at it pretty good to install but good tight fit.
customer_reviews.text: Worked on a 235/75R16 street tread spare on my trailer. Can't speak of durability yet, we'll see in a year or so.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better one
customer_reviews.text: This fell apart as soon as I put it on. It wasn’t a good fit being larger than necessary for a 15” tire, but still came apart. It’s not like I tried to stretch it larger. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: It fits
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover, fits my 15 trailer spare tire well and has a slot joined by two easy to use hooks at the bottom which will allow any moisture to eventually drain out. On these, fit is most important, and this fit my spare
customer_reviews.author: son of the hounds

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Fit my trailer spare perfectly. Seems to be decent quality, has held up for a couple months in the direct sun and has made a road trip without any trouble. Hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Looks and fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 2800bh grand design imagine and fits perfect and looks nice too
customer_reviews.author: E. Geiger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and the fit was perfect. Used this on my 98 Blazer LS 2-door spare tire. Tire size 235/75/15. I also purchase a outdoor sticker/decal and stuck it right in the middle for some look. Looks way better than the spare tire itself did.
customer_reviews.author: BT72

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: It was somewhat difficult to install on my size tire. I took my time and allowed it to stretch some as I went. It looks very good. I'll have to wait and see how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Ward

customer_reviews.title: Graet fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit was great. Price was even better. Seems to be able to stay attached on long travels. If I lose it the price is cheap enough to replace Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: michael ierardi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice spare tire cover for a very nice price...Quality is very good, installation is simple, cover looks great. Remember to purchase the Correct Size cover for your tire. This cover for a 28" tire fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: scott c.

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkles would never come out
customer_reviews.text: The wrinkles never came out and after following all the instructions and tips from previous buyers. I eventually had to take the cover off and just throw it away!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: It is larger than I thought but you can tighten it up so it does the job. I would like to get something to decorate it like a stencil or something.
customer_reviews.author: Aprilla

customer_reviews.title: Good basic spare tire cover.
customer_reviews.text: Basic spare tire cover, fit well and was easy to install, just one hook. Backed vinyl seems sturdy enough to do the job for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: Great tire cover
customer_reviews.text: Wish I bought it sooner, holds up to the elements and takes a beating. Easy to clean and remove if needed. It fit a lot better than I expected it to.
customer_reviews.author: Madelaine

customer_reviews.title: Began to rip upon initial installation and kept on ripping
customer_reviews.text: Fit well to our Rav4 2012's spare tire, but began ripping when we put it on the 2nd time. Cheap enough so that if we have to purchase another next summer bicycling season we may purchase it again (hope not to have to do so). We'd purchased it to use summertime with a hole punched in the center to hold our Thule wheel-rack bike rack (use OEM hard plastic cover the rest of the year - something which looks far better than this or any other spare tire cover replacements we've found).
customer_reviews.author: CoMtWoman

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a 33" tire
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a 285/75R16 tire (32.8"), and it does not fit. It *should* be snug enough to stay on despite not wrapping all the way over the back, but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Pike

customer_reviews.title: Keep below 35mph and it’s great
customer_reviews.text: Too small for my SUV tire - too small. Came off at 112mph. Need this to hold up to 175mph... not even close.
customer_reviews.author: PM Prime

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting a little better quality, its just a common wheel cover made ...
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a little better quality, its just a common wheel cover made of vinyl with like a cloth type inside liner. Will see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: DatGuySal

customer_reviews.title: Boring but does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Wheel cover from caper was stolen and we looked for one to replace it through 100's of pages and found alot of corny sayings and very specific hobby pictures, etc. but we just wanted something simple. this works great, fits the tire snug and cheap so if it gets stolen again we don't care!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: fits
customer_reviews.text: I used this cover for 2011 Suzuki Grand Vitara spare on the back door and it fits like a glove
customer_reviews.author: Georgy

customer_reviews.title: Good snug fit.
customer_reviews.text: Tight fit on my 29" diameter tire. Help putting it on was a plus. A few wrinkles out of the package but should flatten out over time.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: fits nice.
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice and snug. Size charts was correct. Only time will tell to see how long it stands up to the elements. But I would recommend this to others. Happy with item.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt in Reno

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and looks good - we shall see how long the vinyl lasts.
customer_reviews.author: R. Peeler

customer_reviews.title: Not good for a 33" tire.
customer_reviews.text: Cover didn't last longer than 2 months. I had it on a 32.7" tire and after being on the tire for a while it started coming off daily. I would usually catch it before it would fly away, but even after securing it really well it flew of at highway speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Quick to fit.
customer_reviews.text: Went on with not trouble, held up well in a 8,000 mile trip. Can't judge for long term durability and weather resistance over time - only had for about 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, good quality. I have a 2016 4 door Jeep Wrangler Shara Unlimited with stock wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Ogle

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, no issues with install. Fit 02 F150 truck.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Feilmeier

customer_reviews.title: Looks and fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased size according to chart and installed on my 205/75R15 spare for my camper. For perfect and seems durable and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Graidian

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit For Spare Tire Under Vechicle
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this to cover our new spare tire and rim that fits under our minivan. (Our OEM spare rim rusted really bad.) It is well made and very durable. The elastic edge fits the cover on the wheel nicely and secure. Note: the white ring on the cover in the picture I took, is dirt from our garage floor.
customer_reviews.author: itsallgood

customer_reviews.title: Close to perfect - for me
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my RAV4. Seems to be durable and was relatively easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: RCPSY

customer_reviews.title: Covers my spare tire exceptionally well
customer_reviews.text: Had a rough time installing this product at first but once its on it looks good. Nothing fancy keeps the elements off the spare, overall it does its job. For me, it was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value option
customer_reviews.text: Item as described, and great value for the price point. It's not one of the heavy duty types, but that's perfect for the way it's priced. Fit perfectly, easy to put on, should hold up great for a couple years, exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice CRV spare tire cover
customer_reviews.text: I will need to add some grommets to cable it and add a lock to prevent those night time gremlins from "Borrowing" this Nicely done CRV spare tire cover.
customer_reviews.author: Geo T

product_meta.title: Classic Accessories OverDrive Universal Fit Spare Tire Cover, Black, Small
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Size:26.75" - 29.75"At Classic Accessories, we make patio furniture covers, boat covers, RV covers, golf cart enclosures and other items to keep your outdoor furniture and vehicles in great shape, all year long.
feature_bullets: Attractive protection for spare tires on RVs, Vans, and Trucks.
